SIMAC ITAL
COFFEE GRINDER
 
The Somac Ital coffee grinder is an adjustable, conical burr grinder that grinds the beans into a container. A measuring spoon is then used to scoop out the amount of coffee needed. This grinder is specially designed for the Angeli Espresso, Angeli Espresso Inox and Napolissima.
   
   
TECHNICAL DATA
Bean hopper capacity 175gr
Ground coffee container capacity 150gr
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 100W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 11x20x28
Weight (kg) 3
Colours available Black, white
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
